{{Dialogue a-b-a|Ros|We do things differently here, Daisy. This isn't some five-copper bawdy house in Hastings Hall.|Daisy|Haystack Hall.|Wherever you're from.|[[Ros]] giving Daisy a tour of the brothel.|The North Remembers}}
[[Image:Haystack Hall Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Haystack Hall on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Haystack Hall''' is a castle in the [[Stormlands]]. It is the seat of [[House Errol]], located northeast of [[Bronzegate]].
sections.In the books: In the books, Haystack Hall is the seat of House Errol. It is located to the east of the [[Kingsroad]] and north of [[Storm's End]].
sections.History:
===Season 2===
[[Daisy]], a newly acquired prostitute at Lord [[Petyr Baelish]]'s brothel, was originally from Haystack Hall.<ref>"[[The North Remembers]]"</ref>
